title: Does Bitcoin Belong in your 401k?
description:
The CEO of the largest crypto fund makes the case for a Bitcoin ETF. Plus, a VanEck Portfolio manager shares why he's putting crypto in his inflation-fighting fund.

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
